{"id":1199106538,"question_id":3356,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3Â months","timestamp":1710039732,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"135 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1199106538/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Shortest Uncommon Substring in an Array","memory":"45.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public String[] shortestSubstrings(String[] arr) {\n        \n        int len = arr.length;\n        \n        String[] res = new String[len];\n        for(int i=0; i<len; i++){\n            List<String> list = getSub(arr[i]);\n                \n            \n            Collections.sort(list, (a,b)-> a.length()==b.length() ? a.compareTo(b) : a.length()-b.length());\n            // System.out.println(list);\n            for(int j=0; j<list.size(); j++){\n            \n                boolean hit = true;\n                String s = list.get(j);\n                \n                for(int k=0; k<len ;k++){\n                    if(k==i) continue;\n                    if(arr[k].contains(s)){\n                        hit=false;\n                        break;\n                    } \n                }\n                \n                if(hit) {\n                     res[i] = s;\n                    break;\n                }\n                else res[i] = \"\";\n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n  \n        \n        return res   ;\n        \n    }\n    \n    private List<String> getSub (String s){\n        \n        Set<String> set = new TreeSet<>();\n        for(int wLen = 1; wLen<=s.length(); wLen++){\n            for(int i=0; i+wLen<=s.length(); i++){\n                set.add(s.substring(i, i+wLen));\n            }\n        \n        }\n        \n        return new ArrayList<>(set);\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"shortest-uncommon-substring-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
